title: DK Is Staying In Seattle
description:
Laura Rutledge and the NFL Live Crew discuss DK Metcalf’s contract extension, Ryan Jensen’s return window following his knee injury at camp, the Cardinals removing Kyler’s “independent study” clause, and expectations for Joey Bosa and Khalil Mack this season. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: NFL Live: Dk Metcalf gets the extension he's been waiting for and Kyler's "independent study" clause is no more.
